Package info.oais.infomodel.interfaces

Interface DataObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
ArchivalInformationCollection, ArchivalInformationPackage, ArchivalInformationUnit, DigitalObject, DisseminationInformationPackage, InformationPackage, PhysicalObject, SubmissionInformationPackage
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArchivalInformationPackageRefImpl, DataObjectRefImpl, DigitalObjectRefImpl, InformationPackageRefImpl
public interface DataObject
Either a Physical Object or a Digital Object. [OAIS] Data: A reinterpretable representation of information in a formalized manner suitable for communication, interpretation, or processing. NOTE - Examples of data include a sequence of bits, a table of numbers, the characters on a page, the recording of sounds made by a person speaking, or a moon rock specimen. [OAIS]
Since:
06-Sep-2021 15:59:45
Version:
1.0
Author:
David

  • Method Details

    • getObject

      Object getObject()
      Get the Object (if any) which makes up the DataObject. The Object may be an instance of an
      • Identifier, in which case it is a pointer to the actual DataObject
      • String, in which case one may try to print it
      • InputStream, in which case this is a Digital Object
      • other specific types which we can deal with
      Returns:
      The Object or null

    • setObject

      void setObject(Object obj)
      Set the Object of the DataObject.
      Parameters:
      obj - The Object of the DataObject;

    • getIdentifier

      Identifier getIdentifier()
      Get the Identifier of the Information Object
      Returns:
      Identifier for the Info Object

    • setIdentifier

      void setIdentifier(Identifier id)
      Set the Identifier for the Info Object
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier for the Info Object
